Sentencas: In this study sorption-enhanced steam methane reforming (SE-SMR) in fixed beds is investigated by means of 1D numerical modelling, and the model is validated with the data reported in the literature.
Titulo: Modelling of sorption-enhanced steam methane reforming in a fixed bed reactor network integrated with fuel cell

Sentencas: Isothermal conditions (973 K) are considered, and the equilibrium between the carbonation and calcination stages is shifted by a pressure swing: 3.5.10(6)Pa and 1013 Pa, respectively.
Titulo: Modelling of sorption-enhanced steam methane reforming in a fixed bed reactor network integrated with fuel cell

Sentencas: The results showed that under these operating conditions at least 8 reactors in parallel are required to continuously produce a high-purity stream of H-2, and a separated stream of concentrated CO2.
Titulo: Modelling of sorption-enhanced steam methane reforming in a fixed bed reactor network integrated with fuel cell

Sentencas: The average H-2 purity is 0.92, whilst the average H-2 yield and selectivity are 2.9 mol(H2) mol(CH4)(-1) and 90%, respectively.
Titulo: Modelling of sorption-enhanced steam methane reforming in a fixed bed reactor network integrated with fuel cell

Sentencas: A thermodynamic analysis was performed, which highlighted that, by using a portion of the produced H-2 (about 0.4 mol(H2) mol(CH4)(-1)), it is possible to fully cover heat and power demands of the process, making it completely energy self-sufficient.
Titulo: Modelling of sorption-enhanced steam methane reforming in a fixed bed reactor network integrated with fuel cell

Sentencas: In the case when the proposed SE-SMR is integrated with a solid oxide fuel cell, net power generation at the scale of similar to 950 kW(el) can be achieved with a net efficiency of the entire system of 51%, with the important feature that CO2 is concentrated.
Titulo: Modelling of sorption-enhanced steam methane reforming in a fixed bed reactor network integrated with fuel cell
